content: A new proposal has been announced: Reproducible command line + determinism #450. It will be announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it, but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the team, consider proposing a design meeting.
Hi everyone, this is my first MCP for Rust, so if there's anything I can do to help with the discussion please let me know :)

Wanna give a heads up that I am about to be going on vacation (sorry for the timing, but it looks like my vacation may overlap some with @michaelwoerister which is probably good :) @Adrian Taylor is going to help drive this forward in the meantime. I'm looking forward to working more with you all.
